adept.common

Class KBEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.common.KBID
      • adept.common.KBEntity

  • public class KBEntity
extends KBID
    The Class KBEntity represents a pointer to a Knowledge Base Entity uniquely identified by KB URI and source KB type. It derives from parent class KBID.
